title.narrative: Afghanistan - Second Education Quality Improvement Program

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to assist the Recipient in increasing equitableAccess to quality basic education, especially for girls.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2; Section I, Part A.1 | Description :The recipient shall carry out day-to-day oversight of the projectthrough the EQUIP Coordination Unit. | Frequency :Monthly
Finance Agreement :Section I, Part B.1(a) | Description :School Improvement Plans to be prepared by schools eligible for QualityEnhancement Grants. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Section I, Part B.2(a) | Description :Infrastructure Development School Grants shall be provided to eligibleschools based on criteria set out in the PIM. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Section I, Part C.1(a) | Description :Recipient shall adopt and implement the project in accordance with thePIM. | Due Date :31-Oct-2012
Finance Agreement :Section I, Part D.1 | Description :Recipient shall carry out the Project in accordance with the Environmentaland Social Management Framework | Frequency :Monthly
